import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' function UserProfile({user,deliveries}) { const [deliverlen, setDeliverylen] = useState(null) useEffect(() => { if (deliveries?.length !== undefined){ setDeliverylen(del) } }) return (

) } export default UserProfile
